name: Guess the number (OLTEANU)
description:
Hi guys , here we go again whit a small game, called "Guess the number". Is not much to tell about it, is doing what you see from the name, click activated, and will have the android version to download as well, and webgl , to play here and test it. If you like it, you can download the android version for free. This game i made , to study coding , and will add some more option in future. 

Thanks for playing.
